revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Seagate |model=Business Storage |revision=4-Bay NAS |upc=763649033401 |newegg=N82E16822178327 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL |price=430 |est_release_date=2/2013 |type=NAS |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=4.47 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CNS3420 |cpu1_cspeed=700 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F2G08U0C-SCB0 |fla2=512 KiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L4006EM2I-12G |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG8JB-25 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type A), SATA II |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=5 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=eMMC Controller;Phison;PS8007-A;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Controller;ASMedia;ASM1042;;1;,,, 50V 3A PNP Transistor;NXP;PBSS5350Z;;1;,,, 512K SPI Serial Memory;Atmel;AT25F512;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;TI;SN74LVC32A;;1;,,, 5A 32V 500kHZ Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8289;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9045;;1;,,, Dual D-type Positive-Edge-Triggered Flip-Flop;TI;SN74AHC74;;1;,,, PCI Express Gen 2 & Gen 3 Generator;Silicon Labs;SL28PCIe26;;1;,,, 3A 12V Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;ANPEC;APW7145;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;3;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;2;,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ LP LDO RTC;Maxim;MAX17020;;1;,,, PCI Express to Serial ATA Gen II Host Controller;Silicon Image;SiI3531;;1;,,, 2 Port SATA Port Multiplier Storage Processor;Silicon Image;SiI3723;;2;,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;On Semiconductor;ADT7473;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4818B;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, LACP, WoL, heatsink, fan, power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;2008.10-mpcore; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.35.13; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:10:75 }} {{TagLine|Business Storage 4-Bay NAS}} :{{SupportPage|https://www.seagate.com/support/external-hard-drives/network-storage/business-storage-4-bay-nas/}} "ELCAPITAN", "11046-1" and "48.64T01.011" are silkscreened on the board. ===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnet.com/reviews/seagate-business-storage-4-bay-nas-review/ ''Seagate Business Storage 4-Bay NAS'' review on '''CNet'''] *[https://www.alphr.com/networking/32449/seagate-business-storage-4-bay-nas-review/ ''Seagate Business Storage 4-Bay NAS'' review on '''Alphr'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Cavium]] CNS3420 @700MHz :Dual-core (ARM11MP Core) *Memory: 512MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Storage: 512KB (SPI NOR) Flash, :256MB (SLC NAND) Flash, 5x SATA II *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 Type A ports *Power: 19V 4.47A via barrel ==Images== ---- File:Seagate Business Storage 4-Bay Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Seagate Business Storage 4-Bay Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
